channel.title: Foliant Releases History
channel.description: Releases of Foliant documentation authoring tool and its extensions.

item.title: foliantcontrib.epsconvert 1.0.7
item.description: • Fix image reference detection pattern, other minor fixes.

item.title: foliantcontrib.history 1.0.2
item.description: • Do not generate common top-level heading of target Markdown content.

item.title: foliantcontrib.history 1.0.1
item.description: • Add RSS feed generation.

item.title: foliantcontrib.includes 1.1.6
item.description: • Escape regular expression metacharacters in starting and ending headings, IDs, modifiers.

item.title: foliantcontrib.includes 1.1.5
item.description: • Remove meta blocks from the included content.

item.title: foliantcontrib.mkdocs 1.0.10
item.description: • Fix pattern for heading detection.

item.title: foliantcontrib.swaggerdoc 1.2.0
item.description:
• Add spec_path and spec_url parameters.
  • All path tag parameters are now loaded relative to current file.
  • Better logging and error reporting

item.title: foliantcontrib.utils.combined_options 1.0.7
item.description:
• Add validate_exists validator.
  • Add rel_path_convertor.

item.title: foliantcontrib.customids 1.0.6
item.description: • Allow to define custom styles for headings of each level.

item.title: foliantcontrib.confluence 0.4.1
item.description: • Fix: conflict with escape_code

item.title: foliantcontrib.includes 1.1.4
item.description: • Allow for the starting and ending headings to be 1-character long.

item.title: foliantcontrib.confluence 0.4.0
item.description:
• Fix: attachments were not uploaded for nonexistent pages
  • Change confluence api wrapper to atlassian-python-api
  • Rename backend to confluence
  • Better error reporting

item.title: foliantcontrib.mkdocs 1.0.9
item.description: • Allow the first heading to be located not in the beginning of a document.

item.title: foliantcontrib.epsconvert 1.0.6
item.description: • Bug fix: update current directory path before processing of Markdown file content, not after.

item.title: foliantcontrib.imagemagick 1.0.2
item.description: • Bug fix: update current directory path before processing of Markdown file content, not after.

item.title: foliantcontrib.meta 1.1.0
item.description:
• Remove the sections entity.
  • Restructure code.

item.title: foliantcontrib.confluence 0.3.0
item.description:
• Fix bug with images.
  • Add multiple modes and mode parameter.
  • Add toc parameter to automatically insert toc.
  • Fix: upload attachments before text update (this caused images to disappear after manually editing).

item.title: foliantcontrib.meta 1.0.3
item.description: • Add span to meta

item.title: foliantcontrib.confluence 0.2.0
item.description:
• Allow to input login and/or password during build
  • Added pandoc_path option
  • Better logging and error catching

item.title: foliantcontrib.utils.combined_options 1.0.6
item.description:
• Add check for required params.
  • Add val_type validator to check for param types.
  • Allow to set values in Options objects

item.title: foliantcontrib.confluence 0.1.0
item.description: • Initial release.

item.title: foliantcontrib.includes 1.1.3
item.description: • Allow to specify IDs of anchors in the from_id and to_id attributes. Support the to_end attribute.

item.title: foliantcontrib.escapecode 1.0.1
item.description: • Do not ignore diagram definitions. It should be possible to escape the tags used by diagram drawing preprocessors. If some preprocessors need to work with the content that is recognized as code, call UnescapeCode explicitly before them.

item.title: foliantcontrib.replace 1.0.3
item.description: • Fixed issue with PyYAML deprecated loader.

item.title: foliantcontrib.mermaid 1.0.0
item.description: • Initial release

item.title: foliantcontrib.includes 1.1.2
item.description: • Fix include statement regex pattern. Tags joined with | must be in non-capturing parentheses.

item.title: foliant 1.0.10
item.description: • Add escape_code config option. To use it, escapecode and unescapecode preprocessors must be installed.

item.title: foliantcontrib.includes 1.1.1
item.description:
• Support escape_code config option. Require Foliant 1.0.10 and escapecode preprocessor 1.0.0.
  • Process sethead recursively.

item.title: foliantcontrib.utils.preprocessor_ext 1.0.2
item.description:
• fix output
  • remove get_options overriding, it's now implemented similarly in core

item.title: foliantcontrib.bindsympli 1.0.14
item.description:
• Add width attribute to <sympli> tag.
  • Refactor a little.

item.title: foliantcontrib.slugs 1.0.1
item.description: • Add !version and !commit_count YAML tags.

item.title: foliantcontrib.docus 0.2.0
item.description: • More flexible chapters parsing. Lists are now not mandatory.

item.title: foliantcontrib.docus 0.1.0
item.description: • Initial release.

item.title: foliantcontrib.runcommands 1.0.1
item.description: • Capture the output of an external command and write it to STDOUT.

item.title: foliantcontrib.meta 1.0.2
item.description:
• Fix: subsections title may be specified in YFM;
  • Fix: in subsections title was being cropped out

item.title: foliantcontrib.project_graph 1.0.1
item.description:
• Rename rel attributes: rel_path to path, rel_id to id
  • Relation types now don't implicitly go to edge labels. Add label explicitly from now on.
  • Fixed: relations to !project_path and !rel_path didn't work.

item.title: foliantcontrib.meta 1.0.1
item.description:
• Fix: seeds for main sections were not processed.
  • Add debug messages for seeds processing.

item.title: foliantcontrib.project_graph 1.0.0
item.description: Initial release.

item.title: foliantcontrib.meta 1.0.0
item.description: Initial release.

item.title: foliantcontrib.includes 1.1.0
item.description:
• Support Foliant 1.0.9. Add processing of !path, !project_path, and !rel_path modifiers (i.e. YAML tags) in attribute values of pseudo-XML tags inside the included content. Replace the values that preceded by these modifiers with absolute paths resolved depending on current context.
  • Allow to specify the top-level (“root”) directory of Foliant project that the included file belongs to, with optional project_root attribute of the <include> tag. This can be necessary to resolve the !path and the !project_path modifiers in the included content correctly.
  • Allow to specify all necessary parameters of each include statement as attribute values of pseudo-XML tags. Keep legacy syntax for backward compatibility.
  • Update README.

item.title: foliant 1.0.9
item.description:
• Process attribute values of pseudo-XML tags as YAML.
  • Allow single quotes for enclosing attribute values of pseudo-XML tags.
  • Add !project_path and !rel_path YAML tags.

item.title: foliantcontrib.utils.preprocessor_ext 1.0.1
item.description: • support PyYAML 5.1

item.title: foliantcontrib.utils.combined_options 1.0.5
item.description: • support PyYAML 5.1

item.title: foliantcontrib.templateparser 1.0.2
item.description: • support PyYAML 5.1

item.title: foliantcontrib.bindsympli 1.0.13
item.description:
• Set 2-minutes timeout instead of default 30-seconds when launching Chromium.
  • Use page.waitForSelector() instead of page.waitForNavigation().
  • Use custom sleep() function for intentional delays.

item.title: foliantcontrib.badges 1.0.2
item.description: • support params which alter badge look to be supplied in tag params

item.title: foliantcontrib.badges 1.0.1
item.description:
• force img mode on pdf and docx
  • add target parameter

item.title: foliantcontrib.badges 1.0.0
item.description: • Initial release

item.title: foliantcontrib.admonitions 1.0.0
item.description: • Initial release.

item.title: foliantcontrib.graphviz 1.1.1
item.description:
• Remove src param. (Use includes instead)
  • Allow separate tags fail. Preprocessor would issue warning and continue work.

item.title: foliantcontrib.templateparser 1.0.1
item.description:
• add ext_context param for external file with context
  • allow separate templates to fail, the preprocessor would issue warning and skip them

item.title: foliantcontrib.utils.combined_options 1.0.4
item.description: • Add path_convertor which converts string options to pathlib.PosixPath

item.title: foliantcontrib.blockdiag 1.0.5
item.description: • Attributes of pseudo-XML tags have higher priority than config file options.

item.title: foliantcontrib.plantuml 1.0.6
item.description: • Attributes of <plantuml> tag have higher priority than config file options.

item.title: foliantcontrib.utils.preprocessor_ext 1.0.0
item.description: • Initial release.

item.title: foliantcontrib.utils.combined_options 1.0.3
item.description: • add iter method to allow for param in options

item.title: foliantcontrib.utils.combined_options 1.0.2
item.description: • add '0'\'1' to bool_convertor

item.title: foliantcontrib.templateparser 1.0.0
item.description: • Initial release

item.title: foliantcontrib.bindsympli 1.0.12
item.description: • Capture the output of the Puppeter-based script and write it to STDOUT.

item.title: foliantcontrib.swaggerdoc 1.1.3
item.description:
• Fix issues with json and yaml. All spec files are now loaded with yaml loader.
  • Change PyYAML to ruamel.yaml
  • jinja mode is deprecated, widdershins is the default mode

item.title: foliantcontrib.mkdocs 1.0.8
item.description: • Escape control characters (double quotation marks, dollar signs, backticks) that may be used in system shell commands.

item.title: foliantcontrib.pandoc 1.0.10
item.description: • Add backticks to the set of characters that should be escaped.

item.title: foliantcontrib.pandoc 1.0.9
item.description: • Escape double quotation marks (") and dollar signs ($) which may be used in PDF, docx, and TeX generation commands as parts of filenames, variable values, etc. Enclose filenames that may be used in commands into double quotes.

item.title: foliantcontrib.includes 1.0.11
item.description: • Take into account the results of work of preprocessors that may be applied before includes within a single Foliant project. Rewrite the currently processed Markdown file path with the path of corresponding file that is located inside the project source directory only if the currently processed Markdown file is located inside the temporary working directory and the included file is located outside the temporary working directory. Keep all paths unchanged in all other cases.

item.title: foliantcontrib.graphviz 1.0.6
item.description: • Added as_image option.

item.title: foliantcontrib.anchors 1.0.2
item.description: • Added preprocessor_ext for better warnings (and better code)

item.title: foliantcontrib.anchors 1.0.1
item.description: • Added 'element' option to customize anchor span element.

item.title: foliantcontrib.anchors 1.0.0
item.description: • Initial release

item.title: foliantcontrib.utils.combined_options 1.0.1
item.description: • Add boolean convertor

item.title: foliantcontrib.notifier 1.0.0
item.description: Initial release.

item.title: foliantcontrib.testrail 1.1.8
item.description: • Hardcoded section headers processing removed.

• Now it's possible to pass the lambda function from dictionary file.

item.title: foliantcontrib.csvtables 1.0.1
item.description: • setup.py fixed.

item.title: foliantcontrib.graphviz 1.0.4
item.description: • Moved combined_options out

item.description: • Move combined_options into another module

item.title: foliantcontrib.utils.combined_options 1.0.0
item.description: • Initial release.

item.title: foliantcontrib.testrail 1.1.7
item.description: • Sections exclusion fixed.

item.title: foliantcontrib.testrail 1.1.6
item.description: • Case structure output fixed if any problem occurs.

item.title: foliantcontrib.testrail 1.1.5
item.description:
• Bug with test case table numbering when deleting empty objects fixed.
  • Readme updated.

item.title: foliantcontrib.apilinks 1.1.1
item.description: • Added filename to warnings.

item.title: foliantcontrib.bindsympli 1.0.11
item.description: • Disable images downloading from design pages only, but not from login page.

item.title: foliantcontrib.graphviz 1.0.2
item.description:
• Fixed external diagrams not reloading on change.
  • Fixed external diagrams are not crashing preprocessor if the file is missing.

item.title: foliantcontrib.bindsympli 1.0.10
item.description: • Check if the design page exists and the image URL is valid.

item.title: foliantcontrib.graphviz 1.0.1
item.description: • Added 'src' tag option to load diagram source from external file.

item.title: foliantcontrib.graphviz 1.0.0
item.description: • Initial release

item.title: foliantcontrib.apilinks 1.1.0
item.description:
• Prefixes are now case insensitive.
  • Only prefixes which are defined are trimmed.
  • New option only-defined-prefixes to ignore all prefixes which are not listed in config.
  • Options renamed and regrouped. Breaks backward compatibility.
  • Support of several reference pattern and properties (to catch models).
  • Now search on API page for headers h1, h2, h3 and h4.

item.title: foliantcontrib.subset 1.0.8
item.description: • Remove forgotten unnecessary import.

item.title: foliantcontrib.subset 1.0.7
item.description: • Move the imports of the oyaml module directly into the methods that use it.

item.title: foliantcontrib.bindsympli 1.0.9
item.description:
• Move the while loop from JavaScript code to Python code.
  • Add the max_attempts config option.
  • Require Foliant 1.0.8 because of using the utils.output() method.

item.title: foliantcontrib.subset 1.0.6
item.description:
• Fix a bug: check if subset partial config contains chapters section correctly.
  • Inherit the class Cli from BaseCli, not from Cliar.

item.title: foliantcontrib.multiproject 1.0.9
item.description: • Inherit the class Cli from BaseCli, not from Cliar.

item.title: foliantcontrib.apilinks 1.0.5
item.description: • Now both command and endpoint prefix are ensured to start from root (/).

item.title: foliantcontrib.apilinks 1.0.4
item.description:
• Fix not catching errors from urllib.
  • Added 'ignoring-prefix' option.
  • Added 'endpoint-prefix' option into API->Name section.

item.title: foliantcontrib.apilinks 1.0.3
item.description: • Add require-prefix option.

item.title: foliantcontrib.apilinks 1.0.2
item.description: • Trim prefixes function.

item.title: foliantcontrib.apilinks 1.0.1
item.description:
• Update docs, fix anchor error.
  • Add all HTTP verbs to regular expression.

item.title: foliantcontrib.apilinks 1.0.0
item.description: • Initial release.

item.title: foliantcontrib.templates.preprocessor 1.0.3
item.description:
• Fix packages value in setup.py of the template: use foliant.preprocessors instead of foliantcontrib.preprocessors.
  • Require Foliant 1.0.8 in setup.py of the template.

item.title: foliantcontrib.testrail 1.1.4
item.description: • Another bug with multi-select parameter processing fixed.

item.title: foliantcontrib.testrail 1.1.3
item.description:
• Jinja templates updated.
  • Bug with multi-select parameter processing fixed.

item.title: foliantcontrib.testrail 1.1.2
item.description: • Now it's possible to use dropdown type parameters for test cases samplings.

item.title: foliantcontrib.testrail 1.1.1
item.description: • Readme updated.

item.title: foliantcontrib.testrail 1.1.0
item.description:
• Removed parameters:
    • platforms,
    • platform_id,
    • add_cases_without_platform,
    • add_unpublished_cases.
  • Added parameters:
    • exclude_suite_ids — to exclude suites from final document by ID,
    • exclude_section_ids — to exclude sections from final document by ID,
    • exclude_case_ids — to exclude cases from final document by ID,
    • add_case_id_to_std_table - to add column with case ID to the testing table,
    • multi_param_name - name of custom TestRail multi-select parameter for cases sampling,
    • multi_param_select - values of multi-select parameter for cases sampling,
    • multi_param_select_type — sampling method,
    • add_cases_without_multi_param - to add cases without any value of multi-select parameter,
    • add_multi_param_to_case_header — to add values of multi-select parameter to the case headers,
    • add_multi_param_to_std_table — to add column with values of multi-select parameter to the testing table,
    • checkbox_param_name - name of custom TestRail checkbox parameter for cases sampling,
    • checkbox_param_select_type — state of custom TestRail checkbox parameter for cases sampling,
    • choose_priorities — selection of case priorities for cases sampling,
    • add_priority_to_case_header - to add priority to the case header,
    • add_priority_to_std_table — to add column with priority to the testing table.
  • Renamed parameters:
    • add_case_id_to_case_name -> add_case_id_to_case_header.
  • Fixed config parsing.

item.title: foliantcontrib.pgsqldoc 1.1.3
item.description:
• Add tests; refactor code
  • Fix triggers and functions; add description to functions
  • Fix template

item.title: foliantcontrib.templates.preprocessor 1.0.2
item.description:
• Require foliantcontrib.init 1.0.7, import the output() method.
  • Do not rewrite source Markdown file if an error occurs.

item.description: • Provide compatibility with Foliant 1.0.7.

item.title: foliantcontrib.mkdocs 1.0.6
item.description: • Provide compatibility with Foliant 1.0.7.

item.title: foliant 1.0.7
item.description:
• Remove spinner made with Halo.
  • Abolish quiet mode because it is useless if extensions are allowed to write anything to STDOUT.
  • Show full tracebacks in debug mode; write full tracebacks into logs.

item.title: foliantcontrib.init 1.0.6
item.description: • Provide compatibility with Foliant 1.0.7.

item.title: foliantcontrib.multilinetables 1.2.2
item.description: • Problem with deletion of table strings containing only spaces fixed (critical for lists in grid tables).

item.description: • Do not use yaml alias for oyaml module to prevent possible influence of this overriding on other parts of code.

item.description: • Additionally сheck if diagram image is not saved.

item.title: foliantcontrib.blockdiag 1.0.3
item.description: • Do not fail the preprocessor if some diagrams contain errors. Write error messages into the log.

item.title: foliantcontrib.slate 1.0.3
item.description: • Add slate preprocessor which copies the images outside src into the slate project.

item.title: foliantcontrib.testrail 1.0.7
item.description: • Minor fixes.

item.title: foliantcontrib.plantuml 1.0.3

• Add parse_raw option.
  • Do not fail the preprocessor if some diagrams contain errors. Write error messages into the log.

item.title: foliantcontrib.testrail 1.0.6
item.description: • Added: parameters to exclude suite and section headers from the final document.

item.title: foliantcontrib.testrail 1.0.5
item.description: • Minor fixes.

item.description: • Fixed: if there is only one suite in project, it's header not added to the contents.

item.description: • Add package_data to setup.py.

• Bug fixes

item.title: foliantcontrib.swaggerdoc 1.1.1
item.description:
• Add 'additional_json_path' param for jinja mode

item.title: foliantcontrib.multilinetables 1.2.1
item.description: • Possibility to rewrite source files added.

item.title: foliantcontrib.testrail 1.0.3
item.description: • Possibility to rewrite source file added.

item.title: foliantcontrib.bindsympli 1.0.7
item.description: • Use 60-seconds timeout instead of 30-seconds. Provide multiple attempts to open pages.

item.title: foliantcontrib.testrail 1.0.2
item.description: • Suites collecting fixed.

item.title: foliantcontrib.multilinetables 1.2.0
item.description: • Convertation th the grid format added for arbitrary cell' content (multiple paragraphs, code blocks, lists, etc.).

item.title: foliantcontrib.multiproject 1.0.7

item.title: foliantcontrib.multiproject 1.0.6
item.description: • Tidy up CLI arguments.

item.description: • Tidy up command line arguments one more time.

item.title: foliantcontrib.subset 1.0.3
item.description: • Tidy up command line arguments.

item.title: foliantcontrib.subset 1.0.2
item.description: • Fix a bug with object names.

item.title: foliantcontrib.subset 1.0.1
item.description: • Parse YAML fairly. Merge config files recursively.

item.title: foliantcontrib.swaggerdoc 1.1.0

item.title: foliantcontrib.includes 1.0.9
item.description: • Don’t crash on failed repo sync (i.e. when you’re offline).

item.title: foliantcontrib.mkdocs 1.0.5
item.description: • Require MkDocs 1.0.4.

item.title: foliantcontrib.replace 1.0.1
item.description: • Strings with image links are ignored.

item.title: foliantcontrib.gupload 1.1.2
item.description: • Convert to google docs format setting added.

item.title: foliantcontrib.gupload 1.1.1
item.description: • Unification of repository name, settings section name, and command.

item.title: foliantcontrib.gupload 1.1.0
item.description: • Backend was converted to CLI extension.

item.title: foliantcontrib.multilinetables 1.1.3
item.description: • 'targets' option added to the preprocessor settings.

item.title: foliantcontrib.slate 1.0.2
item.description:
• Rename shards_path param to shards. It now accepts string or list.
  • Fix no header param.

item.title: foliantcontrib.slate 1.0.1
item.description: • Remove flatten. First chapter goes to index.html.md; all the rest go into the includes.

item.title: foliantcontrib.gupload 1.0.1
item.description: • Command line authentication was added, for example for Docker use.

item.title: foliantcontrib.testrail 1.0.1
item.description: • Preprocessor folder structure fixed.

item.title: foliantcontrib.bindsympli 1.0.6
item.description: • Do not disable images downloading. Use delays when filling email and password fields. Wait for idle network connections when loading pages.

item.title: foliant 1.0.6
item.description:
• CLI: If no args are provided, print help.
  • Fix tags searching pattern in _unescape preprocessor.

item.title: foliantcontrib.pgsqldoc 1.1.2
item.description:
• Queries are now ordered (not adjustable right now)
  • Flexable filters instead of strict filtering by schema

item.title: foliantcontrib.pgsqldoc 1.1.1
item.description:
• Fix scheme template (blank lines issue)
  • Refactor queries code

item.title: foliantcontrib.multilinetables 1.1.2
item.description:
• Now it's possible to break the text anywhere in multiline tables with custom tag.
  • Fixed determination of columns number in tables with and without side lines.

item.title: foliantcontrib.pgsqldoc 1.1.0
item.description: • Docs and scheme structure is now defined by Jinja2 templates.

item.title: foliantcontrib.multilinetables 1.1.1
item.description: • Bug with regular expression fixed. 3+ code strings with || operator in a row are not perceived as a tables now.

item.title: foliantcontrib.multilinetables 1.1.0
item.description: • Code strings with || operator are not perceived as a tables now.

item.title: foliantcontrib.bump 1.0.2
item.description: • Declare semver as dependency.

item.title: foliantcontrib.bump 1.0.1
item.description: • Fix packaging with setup.py. Poetry doesn't quite do the trick 😔

item.title: foliantcontrib.bump 1.0.0
item.description: Initial release.

item.title: foliantcontrib.mkdocs 1.0.4
item.description: • Provide customizable default names for untitled nested groups of chapters.

item.title: foliantcontrib.flatten 1.0.4
item.description: • Skip empty headings of nested subsections.

item.title: foliantcontrib.includes 1.0.8
item.description:
• Require at least one space after hashes in the beginning of each heading.
  • Add inline option to the <include> tag.
  • Fix the bug: do not ignore empty lines after headings when using sethead.
  • Fix the bug: allow to use less than 3 characters in the heading content.
  • Do not mark as headings the strings that contain more than 6 leading hashes. If shifted heading level is more than 6, mark the heading content as bold paragraph text, not as heading.

item.title: foliantcontrib.multiproject 1.0.5
item.description: • Provide Git submodules support.

item.title: foliantcontrib.flatten 1.0.3
item.description:
• Use flattened file path in includes preprocessor call.
  • Require includes preprocessor 1.0.7.

item.title: foliantcontrib.includes 1.0.7
item.description:
• Fix paths resolving in case of recursive processing of include statements.
  • Allow revision markers in repo aliases.

item.title: foliantcontrib.includes 1.0.6
item.description:
• Fix logging in file search method.
  • Fix top heading level calculation.

item.title: foliantcontrib.multiproject 1.0.4
item.description: • Provide compatibility with Foliant 1.0.5. Allow to use multiple config files.

item.title: foliantcontrib.pandoc 1.0.6
item.description: • Apply flatten after all preprocessors, not before them. This fixes incompatibility with foliantcontrib.includes 1.0.5.

item.title: foliantcontrib.flatten 1.0.2
item.description:
• Fix incorrect includes preprocessor call.
  • Require Foliant 1.0.5.

item.title: foliantcontrib.init 1.0.5
item.description: • Require Foliant 1.0.5 with prompt_toolkit^2.0.0.

item.title: foliantcontrib.customids 1.0.4
item.description: • Provide separate block-level HTML elements for the anchors. Allow to define custom stylesheets for these elements.

item.title: foliantcontrib.includes 1.0.5
item.description:
• Use paths that are relative to the current processed Markdown file.
  • Fix sethead behavior for headings that contains hashes (#).

item.title: foliant 1.0.5
item.description:
• Allow to override default config file name in CLI.
  • Allow multiline tags. Process true and false attribute values as boolean, not as integer.
  • Add tests.
  • Improve code style.

item.title: foliantcontrib.pandoc 1.0.5
item.description: • Add slug config option.

item.title: foliantcontrib.multiproject 1.0.3
item.description: • Fix config loading. Other small fixes.

item.title: foliantcontrib.multiproject 1.0.2
item.description: • Fix bugs with the project directory path and Git repos syncronizing.

item.title: foliantcontrib.multiproject 1.0.1
item.description: • Fix logging.

item.title: foliantcontrib.bindsympli 1.0.5
item.description: • Add logging.

item.title: foliantcontrib.plantuml 1.0.2
item.description: • Fix logging in __init__.

item.title: foliantcontrib.plantuml 1.0.1
item.description: • Add logging.

item.title: foliantcontrib.flatten 1.0.1
item.description:
• Fix incorrect includes preprocessor call.
  • Add logging.
  • Require Foliant 1.0.4.

item.title: foliantcontrib.epsconvert 1.0.4
item.description:
• Do not use image path when computing MD5 hash.
  • Add targets config option.
  • Add logging.

item.title: foliantcontrib.templates.preprocessor 1.0.0
item.description: • Initial release.

item.title: foliantcontrib.customids 1.0.3
item.description:
• Add targets config option.
  • Add logging.

item.title: foliantcontrib.blockdiag 1.0.2
item.description:
• Add logging.
  • Require Foliant 1.0.4.

item.title: foliantcontrib.pandoc 1.0.4
item.description:
• Add logs.
  • Update for Foliant 1.0.4: Pass logger to spinner.
  • Require Foliant 1.0.4.

item.title: foliantcontrib.mkdocs 1.0.3
item.description:
• Add logs.
  • Update for Foliant 1.0.4: Pass logger to spinner.
  • Require Foliant 1.0.4.

item.title: foliantcontrib.init 1.0.4
item.description:
• Replace placeholders in file and directory names.
  • Process *.py files.
  • User Template strings instead of format strings for safer substitutions.
  • Update for Foliant 1.0.4: Pass logger to spinner.
  • Require Foliant 1.0.4.

item.title: foliant 1.0.4
item.description:
• Breaking change. Add logging to all stages of building a project. Config parser extensions, CLI extensions, backends, and preprocessors can now access self.logger and create child loggers with self.logger = self.logger.getChild('newbackend').
  • Add pre backend with pre target that applies the preprocessors from the config and returns a Foliant project that doesn't require any preprocessing.
  • make now returns its result, which makes is easier to call it from extensions.

item.title: foliantcontrib.bindsympli 1.0.4
item.description: • Describe the preprocessor usage in README.md.

item.title: foliantcontrib.bindsympli 1.0.3
item.description: • Eliminate external Perl scripts, rewrite the preprocessor code in Python.

item.title: foliant 1.0.3
item.description: • Fix critical issue when config parsing would fail if any config value contained non-latin characters.

item.title: foliantcontrib.includes 1.0.4
item.description: • Fix the pattern for headings detection.

item.title: foliantcontrib.includes 1.0.3
item.description: • Allow hashes (# characters) in the content of headings.

item.title: foliantcontrib.epsconvert 1.0.3
item.description: • Take into account the content of image file when computing MD5 hash.

item.title: foliantcontrib.epsconvert 1.0.2
item.description:
• Add support of any local paths. Add image cache.
  • Remove mogrify_path and diagrams_cache_dir options, add convert_path and cache_dir instead.

item.title: foliantcontrib.customids 1.0.2
item.description: • Process first heading and all other headings separately.

item.title: foliantcontrib.customids 1.0.1
item.description:
• Update README.md and docstrings.
  • Update long description content type in setup.py

item.title: foliantcontrib.bindsympli 1.0.2
item.description: • Change the path for non-Python scripts once more.

item.title: foliantcontrib.bindsympli 1.0.1
item.description: • Change the path for non-Python scripts.

item.title: foliantcontrib.includes 1.0.2
item.description: • Fix inappropriate translation of image URLs into local paths.

item.title: foliantcontrib.mkdocs 1.0.2
item.description:
• Add use_headings and slug options for MkDocs backend.
  • Fix inappropriate translation of image URLs into local paths in MkDocs preprocessor.

item.title: foliant 1.0.2
item.description: • Use README.md as package description.

item.title: foliantcontrib.epsconvert 1.0.1
item.description: • Add diagrams_cache_dir option support.

item.title: foliantcontrib.pandoc 1.0.3
item.description: • Change Pandoc command line parameter --reference-docx to --reference-doc.

item.title: foliant 1.0.1
item.description: • Fix critical bug with CLI module caused by missing version definition in the root __init__.py file.

item.title: foliant 1.0.0
item.description: • Complete rewrite.

item.title: foliantcontrib.blockdiag 1.0.1
item.description: • Add pdf output format support.

item.title: foliantcontrib.init 1.0.3
item.description:
• Upon creation, relative path to the created project directory is returned instead of an absolute one.
  • Templates: basic: Foliant docs related content removed from README.md.
  • Templates: basic: foliantcontrib.mkdocs added to requirements.txt.

item.title: foliantcontrib.init 1.0.2
item.description:
• Add slug placeholder.
  • Process placeholders in .yml, .txt, and .md files, not just foliant.yml.
  • Templates: basic: Add Dockerfile, docker-compose.yml, requirements.txt, and README.md.

item.title: foliantcontrib.init 1.0.1
item.description:
• Fix issue with init command missing after installation.
  • Fix issue with missing templates after installation.

item.title: foliantcontrib.macros 1.0.3
item.description: • Add tag <m>...</m>.

item.title: foliantcontrib.macros 1.0.2
item.description:
• Switch from unnamed to named parameters.
  • Macro name is now defined in the tag body instead of "name" option.

item.title: foliantcontrib.macros 1.0.1
item.description: • Preserve param case.

item.title: foliantcontrib.flags 1.0.1
item.description: • Add targets and backends options to <if> tag.

item.title: foliantcontrib.pandoc 1.0.2
item.description: • Change default Markdown flavor from markdown_strict to markdown.

item.title: foliantcontrib.pandoc 1.0.1
item.description: • Add tex target.

item.title: foliantcontrib.mkdocs 1.0.1
item.description: • Add ghp target for GitHub Pages deploy with mkdocs gh-deploy.

item.title: foliantcontrib.includes 1.0.1
item.description: • Fix git repo name detection when the repo part contains full stops.
